content: Business Card | School of Electronics, Electrical Engineering and Computer Science | Queen's University Belfast Top Business Card Professor Paul Miller Professor of Artificial Intelligence (AI) Security E-mail: Phone: +44 (0)28 9097 1809/4896 Fax: +44 (0)28 9097 1702 Research Profile: pure.qub.ac.uk/en/persons/paul-miller Room: 02.023Institute of Electronics, Communications and Information Technology,Titanic Quarter AlternateRoom: 03.032Computer Science Building 16A Malone Road Belfast BT9 5BN PostalAddress: The Institute of Electronics, Communications and Information Technology (ECIT) Queen’s University Belfast NI Science Park Queen’s Road Queen’s Island Belfast BT3 9DT Research Interests: Deep Learning for Malware Detection Automated Application Vulnerability Analysis Anomaly Detection for NIDS Video Analytics for Surveillance Research Clusters:   Centre for Secure Information Technologies (CSIT) School & University Responsibilities:   Theme Lead - Cyber Security Deputy Director - CSIT Meet Our People © Queen's University Belfast 2024 Privacy and cookies Website accessibility Freedom of information Modern slavery statement Equality, Diversity and Inclusion University Policies and Procedures Information Privacy and cookies Website accessibility Freedom of information Modern slavery statement Equality, Diversity and Inclusion University Policies and Procedures © Queen's University Belfast 2024 Manage cookies
